meanings.sent1: The moppers cleaned the cafeteria floor after lunch.
meanings.sent2: The school hired new moppers to keep the hallways spotless.
meanings.sent3: The moppers joked about having a 'mop-off' competition.
meanings.sent4: The moppers were like silent dancers, gliding across the tiled floor.
meanings.sent5: The diligent moppers made sure every corner gleamed with cleanliness.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'mopper', referring to multiple individuals who mop floors.
meanings.sent1: In the cleaning crew, the moppers work together efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The team of moppers finished their tasks before the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: During the staff meeting, the moppers shared funny stories from their shifts.
meanings.sent4: The moppers moved in harmony, like a synchronized cleaning squad.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated moppers took pride in their work, ensuring every surface sparkled.
